thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-FDA Accepts New Drug Applications For Merck's Doravirine

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FDA Accepts New Drug Applications For Merck's Doravirine
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Merck & Co Inc:
* FDA ACCEPTS NEW DRUG APPLICATIONS FOR MERCK’S DORAVIRINE, THE COMPANY’S INVESTIGATIONAL NON-NUCLEOSIDE REVERSE TRANSCRIPTASE INHIBITOR (NNRTI), FOR TREATMENT OF HIV-1 INFECTION
* MERCK & CO INC - FDA HAS SET A TARGET ACTION DATE OF OCT. 23, 2018, FOR BOTH APPLICATIONS UNDER PRESCRIPTION DRUG USER FEE ACT
* FDA ACCEPTS NEW DRUG APPLICATIONS FOR MERCK’S DORAVIRINE, THE COMPANY’S INVESTIGATIONAL NON-NUCLEOSIDE REVERSE TRANSCRIPTASE INHIBITOR (NNRTI), FOR TREATMENT OF HIV-1 INFECTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
